## PopulatableEthersLiquity.adjustTrove() method

Adjust existing Trove by changing its collateral, debt, or both.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adjustTrove(params: any, ICRWithFees: any, maxBorrowingRateOrOptionalParams: any, overrides: any): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | any | Parameters of the adjustment. |
|  ICRWithFees | any |  |
|  maxBorrowingRateOrOptionalParams | any |  |
|  overrides | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Remarks

The transaction will fail if the Trove's debt would fall below [YUSD\_MINIMUM\_DEBT](./lib-base.yusd_minimum_debt.md)<!-- -->.

If `maxBorrowingRate` is omitted, the current borrowing rate plus 0.5% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
